feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:41 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: NW 46 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near noon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
